name: Bacon Clicker - Yup Bacon!
description:
The time to grow your Bacon Empire is NOW!

Bacon Clicker is really simple and really fun game:
- Produce as much bacon as you can by clicking/tapping the mega bacon.
- When you produce enough bacon, goto the shop to upgrade your production to bring home even MORE bacon!

Super fun and addictive!

Download this game before anyone else!!
